Introduction
This topic contains instructions for handling service records, including
protecting service records
storage of original STRs
handling photocopies of service records
storage of paper copies of service records
proper handling of
VA Form 21-4582, Service Department Records Envelope
handling
fire-damaged service records
service records on microfiche
, and
STRs that contain a deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) specimen
responding to a Veteran’s inquiry about the DNA specimen
sample documentation of the destruction of a DNA specimen
, and
sample letter for responding to an inquiry when STRs
did contain a DNA specimen
, and
never contained a DNA specimen
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Restricted Records Storage and Control
citation: Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
